title.narrative: PLANNING, MONITORING AND EVALUATION

description.narrative: Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Cross Sectoral includes Support and PME

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation

description.narrative: UNICEF strengthened its partnership with the Department of Project Management and Monitoring to support Sri Lanka's efforts in monitoring the SDGs. Further, UNICEF supported publication of the SDG framework targets and indicators. UNICEF also strengthened monitoring and evaluation systems to meet the requirements of the SDG agenda. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2017
